title: Multi-Mode RC Car
description: This project is a Bluetooth-controlled RC car built using an Arduino Uno and an L293D motor driver shield. It uses an HC-06 Bluetooth module for wireless communication with a smartphone. The car is powered by two 3.7V Li-ion batteries in series and features four DC motors for movement. This car can also run in autonomous mode using ultrasonic sensor and also works with voice command using blutooth.
